name: Cloud Storage buckets are not anonymously or publicly accessible
query: buckets(where: {hasIAMPolicy_SOME: {hasBucketIAMPolicyBinding_SOME: {OR: [{ members_INCLUDES: "allUsers" }{ members_INCLUDES: "allAuthenticatedUsers" }]}}}) {identifier, accountID, cloudAccountID, cloudAccountName, cloudProvider, idFromProvider, internalAssetType, internalName, internalRegion, assetCategory, contentHash}
